alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:30PM CDT until July 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR EASTERN DICKINSON AND NORTHEASTERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Orleans to near Terril to near Lost Island Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 6:10 pm. a personal weather station recorded a 62 mph wind gust 3 miles southwest of Terrill, IA. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lost Island Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
